reviewText:
This is a soft core comedy film.  It is about 6 girls in a boarding school trying to get sex education on their own plans.  Visiting a porn shop; Exercising naked with a male coach; Kissing and touching each other on a grassland: Bicycling without a pant; Running and Jumping naked;
...  Their naughty actions have been caught but accepted by the female teacher.  In the end, this teacher joins in as one of this sexy group.

This is a great movie. It has about a half dozen attractive women who repeatedly appear totally naked and sometimes have sex. That is the plot, so the dubbing is not a problem. The women in this movie have many hobbies, including Naked Leapfrog, Naked Jogging, Naked Calisthenics, Naked Pranks on strangers, Naked Bike Riding, and Sex.
This review is for the German produced Sechs Schwedinnen im Pensionat which is being sold here as Six Swedes On A Campus. My DVD is PAL Only, and Region 2 (Europe Only) so it requires a Region Free PAL/NTSC format DVD player which can be bought for about $40. The movie was apparently produced in 1979.
This movie on Blu-Ray, is so awesome to be watching!! And Bridget Lahaie is so very hot in this film!!!
Wonderfully funny movie.  Always love watching Brigitte Lahaie.

Another hacked-to-pieces, grind-enamel-off-your-teeth-while-your-intelligence-is-insulted flick reintroduced to an unsuspecting market to cash in on the notariety of Brigitte Lahaie. ALL the good scenes are devastatingly edited, apparantly with a chain saw, leaving us with an incoherent, mindless mess that makes late-nite Skinemax flix look like Stanley Kubrick's catalog. This would be a wretched film even with the good parts left alone, and at the price point asked for on Amazon (or anywhere else), it's akin to outright robbery or a cavity search. Avoid this at all costs, and if someone wants to give you it for free, you'd STILL be better off without it. Even 'High', these 'Girls' failed the 'Test'.

Warning!!! This is not an uncut version of the movie!!! The most interesting bits (if you see what I mean...) are missing from the original German version ("Six Schwedinnen von der Tankstelle"). The German version provides some nice close ups that are not on this DVD and most of the hot scenes are way shorter than expected. I can only recommend you to avoid buying it. Save your money!!!
